Name: Papa Bear
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Tim Homewood at Dirty Martini Bar in London, England. Named after an old family friend who passed away. He was known to all of his children as 'daddy bear' so Papa Bear seemed appropriate.
Nutrition: One serving of Papa Bear contains 155 calories
